price: 45. Ô Prophète ! Nous t’avons envoyé en témoin, en annonciateur et en avertisseur,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
